Docs.summary: Gets or sets the delegate for customizing delay for the retry policy.
Docs.remarks: By default this is null and the delay will be calculated based on the backoff type only.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the predicate which defines what results shall be treated as transient error by the policy.
Docs.remarks: By default, it will not retry any final result.
